name.en: Aise the Snowmaiden of Sacred Splendor
name.ja: <ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>麗<rt>れい</rt></ruby>の<ruby>凍<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>姫<rt>き</rt></ruby>エイス

requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Warrior Type monster with 2500 ATK/2500 DEF from your hand or Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. Then, you can change the battle position of 1 face-up WATER Attribute monster on your field.
